amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce Immigration and Customs Enforcement salaries and expenses by $501,331,000 and to apply the savings to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to decrease Immigration and Customs Enforcement salaries and expenses by $501,331,000 and apply the savings to the spending reduction account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Polis amendment (A015) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Polis amendment (A015) Failed by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A015) offered by Mr. Polis.
